## DesignToken.deleteValueFor() method

Removes a value set for an element.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
deleteValueFor(element: HTMLElement): this;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  element | HTMLElement | The element to remove the value from |

<b>Returns:</b>

this
